channel.title: Cheezescape Returns [317-old RSPS] [Creator - Matt]
channel.description:
.•*´¨) `¸.•´¸.•*´¨)¸.•*¨) (¸.•´ (¸.•[i]CheezeScape Returns[/i]
[i]Hello im the creator of Cheezescape Returns and im going to bring back a classic server better than ever and there will be updates taking place everyday on my server and forums.Hopefully im eventually going to create something worth while and i'll be hosting in the near future which should be soon as ill just host it in Beta stage.My plan is to create a server with skills and great pking with a stable base as im going to clean it out as much as i possibly can and remove /nulls / bugs / glitches / dupes/ and so on.[/i]
[i]Base::[/i]Cheezescape I Cleaned out
Player logged in - [12/01/10] [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/1ovw4z.jpg[/img]

got my client down to 56KB nah so im getting there just kinda hard now lol and souls ure account pass would be different if i hosted anyways lol.

Cool, goodluck dude,

item.title: Cheezescape Returns [317-old RSPS] [Creator - Matt]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“shardyboy, post:6, topic:325207”]314KB so it shud do[/quote]You should remove everything from it that doesn’t include logging in and data reading. Mine’s down to 17.8kb and I still have a lot of cleaning to do, and it’s great having your own framework where you know where everything’s at.

Cool at the project, I guess. I’ve never played CheezScape as a public server, but update 80 was the base I always used for my first servers. Good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheezescape Returns [317-old RSPS] [Creator - Matt]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:11, topic:325207”][quote author=B2300 T4nk link=topic=421545.msg3095890#msg3095890 date=1263313066]

Whats ur client.java size? =D im gonna lol if its not cleaned.
[/quote]Its called client class.

It’s class client dumbass

and giving rsps another chance? you said you left and you were still visiting these forums regularly, just not posting haha[/quote]

no1 needed your 2 cents.

@topic:
i wish you luck with the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Cheezescape Returns [317-old RSPS] [Creator - Matt]
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

goodluck, cheezescape was cool and one of the first sources i had ever downloaded, a few months ago when i got into rsps development.
you need to primarily work on stability and cleaning, also since its wL based you should remove thread per client and do some other core improvements.

Read full topic
